body.name: Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 28Kpa Powerful Suction Vacuum with 350W Brushless Motor, Lightweight Stick Vacuum Cleaner Max 45 Min Runtime for Carpet and Hard Floor Pet Hair
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 10 mins
features: 🏠[3 Powerful Suction Modes] The cordless vacuum cleaner equipped with a 350W upgraded brushless motor with 28Kpa Powerful suction on Max mode. The excellent performance can help you deal with all varieties of dust and dirt such as pet hair, cat litter, dog food with ease!

🏠[Better Cleaning Results] Multi-cones and HEPA filtration system captures 100% fine particles (size > 0.1 μm) and 95% of ultra-fine particles (size < 0.1 μm). Thus, it exhale ultimate purified air for your family and prevents secondary air pollution.

🏠[Self-standing, Easy to Store] With self standing design, you can stand the vacuum cleaner wherever you want, without using wall-mounted brackets to damage the wall. With abundant accessories including dusting brush and LED light crevice tool, you can clean any gap and crevice easily.

🏠[Up to 45 Mins of Runtime] A detachable high-performance batteries can provide as long as 45 minutes of uninterrupted operation time (* Measured at the Hand Vacuum in Standard Mode), Contains 7 Cells* 2200 batteries.

🏠[1.2L Large Dustcup] Release 1.2L of dust at the touch of a button completely say goodbye to dust inhalation. Note: Filters and sponges can be washed. Regularly clean the filter to prevent the vacuum cleaner from weakening and blocking.
🏠[Purchase with Confidence] We offer 7/24hrs customer service and life-time 100% satisfactory after-sales service for the DEVOAC S11 cordless stick vacuum cleaner.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Metal Tube With the Retractable tube, you can easily adjust the vacuum cleaner from 35'' to 46''. 2 Charging Ways The detachable battery design allows you to charge it more convenient. Note: The battery needs 4.5 hours to be fully charged. Ultra-Quiet Operation The brushless motor generates less heat and noise (65db), so it's more energy-saving and longer service life. 1.2L Removable Dustbin No need to dump rubbish frequently, and you can drop the trash off quickly with one click release button, without dirty your hands and keep cleaning.

How often should I clean the dust cup and filter? The dust cup is removable, so it is recommended to clean the dust cup after each use and clean the filter monthly. Replace the filter every 2 months. Does the charger adapter support 220V volts? The adapter is a 2 prong charger, it can be used for 110V -230V volts. What's the runtime and charging time of the battery? The battery needs to be charged for 4.5 hours. After fully charged, the vacuum cleaner will work up to 45 mins on standard speed, 30 mins on medium speed and 15 mins on Max speed. Working time also depends on different floor types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very quiet, has great suction power but the only fault would be the battery life!! Overall love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Low cost alternative to the higher cost stick vacs
reviews.reviewText: Okay I've been a huge fan of the stick cordless vacs from high end brands for a long time. Enough that we have about three of them in the house and one for the garage. However one of our originals is starting to die a slow death so I needed an alternative that didn't cost an arm in a leg as it was being used in a small area of the house. So I decided to pick this up to try since it was affordably priced, wasn't going to be our main vacuum and it had enough attachments.The vac was sent in a nice box with all of the attachments. Wife stated that she was surprised that it didn't come with more attachments however the second statement was that she really never used all the various ones and these looked to be the ones she'd actually use. The entire unit doesn't feel premium, rather budget friendly due to the price and would never be mistaken as high dollar. But it's fine for the price.The unit wasn't charged, so we fully charged it, it uses a barrel charger that you plug in and comes with a wall mount dock. It's not elegant as the dock screws into the wall and you have to manually plug in the power. No biggie at this price point I'm fine with that. We used floor cleaning attachment and like that it has a light on it and the three speed suction works well on our stained concrete floors. The one thing that may be gimmicky but neat is the LED light crevice tool. It's not super bright but it illuminates enough. We ended up vacuuming our downstairs on the medium setting and it worked well. The brush head is smaller than we're used to but that's not a terrible thing because it does get in the harder to reach areas where our larger one doesn't as easily.All in all we'll be putting it through it's paces for the next month and seeing if it's a nice low budget alternative. I'd recommend this for occasional or limited duty use but not for a total replacement vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you want a premium cleaning experience without mortgaging your house, this is it.
reviews.reviewText: First off, unboxing this vacuum was like discovering a hidden gem. Every component was nestled snugly in custom foam forms, and each part was shielded with a protective sleeve. They even covered the wall charger with protective film, which, let's be honest, is like finding an extra fry at the bottom of the bag—a delightful little bonus.Now, let's talk about build quality, because oh boy, this thing feels like it was crafted by elves in some premium gadget workshop. The different configurations available are not just some marketing fluff; they genuinely add to its versatility. Picture this: you can switch from tackling a mountain of pet hair to delving into the dark corners of your living room with the ease of a cat leaping onto a windowsill.And the brush head? I expected some passive, spin-if-you're-lucky kind of deal, but nope. It's powered, thanks to connecting electrical leads along each component, giving you a cleaning experience that says, "I mean business."Suction? We're talking 28Kpa-level suction on Max mode. In human language, that means it sucks up dirt and debris like a champ—everything from pet hair to cat litter to the crumbs of your failed cooking experiments. All of this without feeling like you're lugging around a piece of heavy machinery; it's lightweight yet robust.The filtration system is not just a bunch of mesh thrown together; it’s a bona fide HEPA filtration system. This thing traps particles like a pro goalie, making it easy to clean and reuse without sacrificing performance. And speaking of performance, 45 minutes of runtime is nothing to scoff at. That's nearly an episode of your favorite binge-worthy show, all while making your floors look like they were cleaned by a professional.Let's not forget the 1.2L dust cup; it’s more like a chalice of cleanliness that you can empty at the touch of a button. We're talking convenience and capacity wrapped into one.So, if you want a premium cleaning experience without mortgaging your house, this is it. The DEVOAC S11 delivers way more than you'd expect for its price point. A solid 5/5, and that's not something I say lightly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery life is very bad
reviews.reviewText: It is a good vacuum for a quick surface cleaning, and pick up a quick mess. But the battery life is very bad. With a full charge, it didn't even last 30 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong suction & super lightweight.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use , lightweight & powerful vacuum. Works great on hardwood & carpets. Suction power is strong & does very well picking up pet hair . Love the convenience of it being crechargeable! that I can vacuum every room before having to recharge!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use, Versatile Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Got tired of lugging our upright vacuum up and down the stairs, so picked this up for spot cleaning upstairs. Works great for that, and is very portable and lightweight. I'm just storing it away in my closet, where it can charge when not in use. Very easy to grab whenever I need to vacuum up something in my bedroom or bathroom. Does it's job well on both carpet and tile, easily sucking up pet hair and other miscellaneous messes. I like that it has different attachments and that the height can be easily adjusted.It's not as powerful as our corded, upright vacuum, but it's a fraction of the weight and much easier to maneuver around. I'll probably never use the upright attachments again -- so much easier to vacuum the stairs and any surfaces up off the ground with this unit.
